==============
PurchaseTicket
==============


A graphical example of using the web3 api to check balances and `purchase tickets <https://github.com/FUSIONFoundation/PurchaseTicket>`_.

You can see it live in action at: `https://tickets.fusionnetwork.io/ <https://tickets.fusionnetwork.io/>`_.

And the source can be found on github at: `https://github.com/FUSIONFoundation/PurchaseTicket <https://github.com/FUSIONFoundation/PurchaseTicket>`_.
